trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as the base class for the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> classes.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to fill the background of the content area.
For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to not use a background brush.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A> property is often used to append content to the end of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the start of content in the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A> property is often used to insert content to the beginning of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the start of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the element.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the element.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.
The default is the font determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.
The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.
The default depends on current system settings and depends on the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
FontSize is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.
The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the font style for the content of the element.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyles"></xref> class that specifies the desired font style.
The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the top-level font weight for the content of the element.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeights"></xref> class that specifies the desired font weight.
The default value is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to apply to the content of the element.
The brush used to apply to the text contents.
The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
d is .
Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of the element.
An enumerator for the logical children.
Handles notifications that one or more of the dependency properties that exist on the element have had their effective values changed.
This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Arguments associated with the property value change.

The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property*> property specifies which property has changed, the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue*> property specifies the previous property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*> property specifies the new property value.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> property.
The new value to set the property to.
d is .
Adds a child object.
The child object to add.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
The text to add to the object.
Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.
By default, this property is set to `null` and has no <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> associated with it.
Before adding any text effects, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> and assign it to this property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> containing one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (not an empty collection).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A> property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts.
A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant.
For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref> object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.
For a list of default typography values, see <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref>.
